# usageTime

**Instance Property**

The amount of time the user uses the app.

## Declaration

```swift
var usageTime: TimeInterval { get }
```

## Timing App Use

- **relativeStartTime**: The time the user starts the app relative to the start time of the first app in a report interval.

items.description: The time the user starts the app relative to the start time of the first app in a report interval.
